{{Description|Use the least amount of Construction Points you can to construct a path that connects all checkpoints.}}
'''Project Connectivity''' is a part of the [[A Parade of Providence]] event in Version 3.6. Complete ''[[Project Connectivity]]'' to unlock the event segment.

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Project Connectivity 1.png
|text1  = Spend {{Color|help|Construction Points}} in Construction Mode during Project Connectivity to construct a road and use the Test Mode to check if the road you have created will {{Color|help|take you from the designated start through all checkpoints. Checkpoints can be accessed in any order}}.
|image2 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Project Connectivity 2.png
|text2  = In Test Mode, you need to stay on {{Color|help|pre-built or placed Construction Materials}}. If you fall, you will be sent back to the start or to a checkpoint.
|image3 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Project Connectivity 3.png
|text3  = In Test Mode, getting through all the checkpoints will constitute a successful challenge. Upon success, the less {{Color|help|total Construction Points}} you spent, the higher the score you will get.
|image4 = Tutorial A Parade of Providence Project Connectivity 4.png
|text4  = Each challenge will grant you different Construction Materials with different costs. The continued use of each Construction Material will cause its cost to increase. Use different materials suitably to create the best road.
}}
